title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Robinson R44 Raven II helicopter
description:
In this video we will look at the Robinson R44 Raven II helicopter which has been released yesterday. The helicopter is in the early development stages so there is still some work to do. The good news however is that you can already fly with it. Read the manual which is provided as part of the download correctly or you might end up with the same issues as I had while recording this video.

If you also want to give the Robinson R44 Raven II helicopter a try download it from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/20566/robinson-r44-raven-ii-helicopter-project
